channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Rottnest Island
item.description: Trip to Rottnest Island - Visited on 29 Dec 2022 Reached Fremantle Port Shed B at 9:30am, Ferry departed at 10:30am! Tickets were booked from Rottnest Express’s website. Isn’t that guy looks cool? 😎 Look! I caught the boat! haha jk It took around 30minutes to reach Rottnest Island. First meal at Rottnest Island 🍴😋 Rating : 7/10 hehe There are Quokkas everywhere on this island!!! BUT you can’t touch them!

item.title: Perth
item.description: Perth Trip (23 Dec 2022 - 09 Jan 2023) This is my first time ever to travel abroad and I’m travelling solo😝

item.title: About
item.description: Self-intro 😶‍🌫️ Hello hoomans, I'm Sok Ling! ("CSL") Born in 01 and majoring in Accounting & Finance (UOL Y2 BSc) in Help Academy, Malaysia. I enjoy listening to the music when I study and I like to take photo of nice views and good foods. I used to play 🏀 and represent the my state :) I'm learning make-up, investments, cooking and trying to maintain a healthy lifestyle🤪. The purpose of creating this website is to post random things, record everything down as memories!
